page.title: 08A HOUSEWIFE'S DAY
page.content:
My husband is a farmworker on Needwood House Estate. We have 2 children age 7 and 9 and live in rent and rate free accommodation.
I get up at 7.50 am, and get the children ready to take them by car to school for 8.50 calling at the village shop on the way home. Morning spent on household chores and preparing hot mid-day meal. Shopping or pottering in garden in the afternoon before I collect children from school at 3.30, then ferry them to after-school activities.
From 6 to 9 pm I do market research by telephone, putting children to bed about 8.30. Then an hour's writing until 10 pm when I relax - and so to bed.
